Lambda Calculus

In my last post I had mentioned that I was playing around with Sonic Pi, and since then things have spiraled into me actually making a Bandcamp page to share music I’ve made.

I’m also learning Overtone, Sonic Pi’s more powerful, Clojure sibling. In general I’ve been making an effort to properly learn lisp.

September 22, 2015JC Leyba

Sonic Pi

Lately I’ve been playing with Sonic Pi, a delightful Ruby-based language for livecoding music.

I have a hard time making music with traditional software but somehow am able to code it - it’s easier.

It’s a ton of fun and a great way to waste time.
